Posts.Content: Martessa2553 wrote: I had a simple mastectomy with nipple sparring on 9/23/13 with immediate reconstruction - an extender was put in. Just had an appointment with the plastic surgeon . I am still having problems after surgery. Some type of a problem that the doctor is not sure what it is. I was put on Benadryl 3x a day and one of claritin. to see if it will take care of the problem. The redness, itching and pressure is very uncomfortable. Has anyone every been through something similar? Dx 7/19/2013, DCIS, 1cm, Stage 0, Grade 1, 0/6 nodes, ER+/PR- Surgery 9/23/2013 Mastectomy: Right; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Hormonal Therapy 12/1/2013 Arimidex (anastrozole) Surgery 7/10/2014 Reconstruction (right) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: After Mastectomy Martessa2553 Martessa2553
